short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Genius lyrics for the track that's currently being played on Spotify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inferhythm helps you find the Genius page for the track you're listening to on Spotify. Within a couple of clicks, you can find the meaning behind the lyrics without having to type out what you're looking for on Genius or Google.
